programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Ania Magliano spews some blue jelly, Sanjeev Bhaskar asks for a comfort break, Reece Shearsmith hocks up some bread and Maisie Adam squawks like an exotic bird. Greg Davies takes it all in before handing out some points.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: In Edinburgh, Gary and Bill are torn over their four-bed home set in the grounds of a graveyard. Bill loves its quirkiness, but Gary hates the higgledy-piggledy layout.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon and Henry head to north Wales where Henry finds an antique cannon in antique dealers Sue and Joshs storage shed. Simon finds a croquet set in need of restoration.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The pickers meet a fast-talking negotiator who is determined to get top dollar for her collection. They also visit a local artist has a killer collection of atomic age lamps and pricey glow-in-the-dark sculptures.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In France, trial guests test out our novice BandBers efforts. In Spain, reality sets in for our new bar owners as things really start to take shape. We meet a family chasing their Italian dream. And theres wedding bells in Alicante.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie catches up with Gary and Bill, who were torn over their higgledy-piggledy cemetery lodge in Edinburgh. But did Kirsties transformation trump Phils finds?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Craig Rowe helps Andy and Vicky find their dream holiday home on Crete, to enjoy the Greek way of life. With a budget of Â£90k, can they find somewhere they love enough to make an offer?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sammies after a place on Mallorca for family holidays and girly trips. Will a flat next to her favourite bar in Magaluf or a place that takes a trip down memory lane in Alcudia be the one?

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine With Me: Return of the Worst
programme.desc: The most calamitous celebrity hosts from `Celebrity Come Dine with Me, return for a week of second chance dinner parties. First up, entertainer Bobby Davro is sure he has learnt his lesson after the blunders of his previous party where he served up measly portions and an inedible dessert. His love of fun and frolics is the inspiration behind his `School Days themed menu and dress code.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Wayne Sleep is determined to prove that he can cut the mustard in the kitchen. Wayne plans a Moulin Rouge theme with a dress code to suit.

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine With Me: Return of the Worst
programme.desc: Its day three and time for `Apprentice star Raef Bjayou to take a turn. First time round, Raefs meal came courtesy of the hired help, though he still came last! So this time round he plans to do the cooking by himself to stand a chance of winning.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Socialite Tamara Beckwith is so cool and calm about entertaining that she has enough time to get her hair done, while smiling for the paparazzi! However, when she finally gets round to doing some cooking, her pudding sinks dramatically.

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lesley Joseph loves entertaining but admits her cooking isnt the best, so its no surprise that her lamb isnt cooked, leaving guests with a meal of raw meat, and her pineapple surprise contains no pineapple.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

Clint needs a doctor, so glamorous GP Sasha hurries over to assist - and the attraction between herself and Donal is instant. But as the pair help Clint towards Sashas car, the vehicle explodes.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A health-conscious couple from London enlist Sonali Shah to help them spend Â£1.3million on a detached property in Surrey with enough land to create a wellness retreat. Taking a breather from house hunting, Sonali immerses herself in the countys ancient woodlands as she learns about the Japanese practice of forest bathing.

programme.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

programme.title: The One Show

programme.title: Policing Paradise
programme.desc: On duty at Bermudas international airport is officer Paul Watson. The subtropical island has strict laws on the importation of narcotics, and the British-born Bobby known as Geordie works alongside airport customs to keep the airport free of drugs. But with 800,000 passengers flying into the island each year, its never easy. Officers stop a suspicious group of young people and discover one of them is carrying a vape containing THC, the active ingredient in cannabis.

programme.title: Return to Paradise
programme.desc: A scientist working at a shark research lab is found dead on a runaway boat. Mack suspects the death is a meticulously planned murder.

programme.title: Have I Got News for You

programme.title: How Are You? Its Alan (Partridge)
programme.desc: Newly single and never happier, Alan throws himself into new experiences to see if trying fresh things can improve our wellbeing. He finds joy in the unexpected.

programme.desc: The latest national and international news, with reports from BBC correspondents worldwide.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sian Eleri investigates a seemingly ordinary farmhouse in north Wales, which, in the late 1990s, was widely considered the most haunted house in Britain. The story made local and national headlines as the family who lived at the farm became ever more desperate in their search for answers. More than 300 allegedly paranormal events were documented at the Flintshire farmhouse in video footage, audio interviews, photos and eyewitness accounts - all of which has been locked away until now.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sian is frustrated that she still hasnt been able to contact the Gower family who lived at the farmhouse - David, a former headmaster, his wife Rose-Mary and their son John-Paul. But there is a breakthrough of another kind when the current owner of Penyffordd Farm gets in touch and invites her over to see the house shes heard so much about. Sian is welcomed in by Michael, who bought the house in Flintshire from the Gowers despite stories that it was haunted.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: `Horrible Histories looks at how the war affected those left back home in the UK, on the home front. We start with the initial panic following the declaration of war, and the measures taken at home to prepare for an imminent Nazi invasion.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: `The Hit List plays on as Marvin and Rochelle Humes host the quiz where contestants must name hit songs and artists from the last seven decades and every style of music as quickly as possible. Joining them in the studio, all hoping to win a chance at the Â£10,000 cash prize, are twin sisters Katie and Stacey from Stoke-on-Trent, father and son Peter and Peter from Dundee and sisters Ivy and Karen from Swansea.

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Lauren and Louise from Wigan, colleagues Sam and Shaun from Liverpool, and students Alex and Lena from Cardiff are all put through their picture paces by Alan. Theyll face each other across three rounds against the clock.

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Wes Cravens follow-up to the classic `Scream is set two years after the tragic events in Woodsboro and refers knowingly to the original. While the characters discuss the events of a terrifying summer, the killer returns.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Village That Saw Aliens
programme.desc: As Sian Eleri tries to track down the boys who reported the UFO sighting in West Wales, she traces the original drawings, chases down leads on the lads, and comes across the case files of the original investigator.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Village That Saw Aliens
programme.desc: Sians investigation into a reported UFO sighting by 14 schoolboys in a playground in West Wales ramps up a gear. Now she has a tape of hotelier Rosa claiming she saw a spaceship land and two creatures appear weeks before the primary school sighting in Broad Haven. As Sian digs through the original case files, she hones in on rational explanations for what happened, only for new information to suggest there could be some truth to the stories.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Village That Saw Aliens
programme.desc: Sian is midway into her investigation, and with corroborating eyewitness accounts of cigar-shaped crafts building and now strange orbs of light in the sky that left people terrified, shes desperate for logical explanations.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Village That Saw Aliens
programme.desc: Sians investigation into the reports of mass UFO sightings that began in a playground in West Wales draws her into unsettling questions around secret military testing, evidence of a craft that defies human capabilities, and conspiracy theories.

programme.title: BBC News

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Today, Ronny, Andrea, Lisa and Joe battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its judging day, and only one chef can go through to represent Scotland. RNLI volunteer and Pride of Scotland winner Ben Thompson helps decide the winner from the two remaining chefs.

programme.title: Thailand: Earths Tropical Paradise

Spirituality can be found in human and animal relationships, both likely and unlikely. This bustling region is known as the nations rice bowl, but even here, there are magical places to be found.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The team visits the Old Royal Naval College in Greenwich. Antique experts Mark Stacey and Jonathan Pratt find a varied collection of objects among the hundreds of visitors. Paul Martin takes a ride along the Thames on board an amphibious vehicle.

programme.desc: Jack Carroll, Dani Harmer, Dominic Littlewood and Shivi Ramoutar test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Monty Dons Spanish Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don travels across the north of Spain, from west to east across Galicia, Cantabria, Asturias, the Basque Country and Catalonia.

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: A team of police travel to the Outer Hebrides to search through the snow for a missing 16-year-old. In Shetland, the cops have to deal with Viking revellers and a drunk driver.

programme.title: The Ridge
programme.desc: Mia makes enemies as she lines up suspects. She discovers Cassy had secrets, leading to conflict between Ewan and Teddy - but little does she realise that Ewan has a secret of his own.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: The RNLI volunteers race against time to try and save three people in the water in the Bristol Channel, a father and son trapped against a cliff face and a badly injured sailor.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked

programme.desc: Sula and Bing are camping in Bings garden in order to see the stars and the moon. As Flop goes back for Hoppity, night-time noises seep from the dark garden, spooking Bing. Then, a scary shape on the tent terrifies him. They go inside, but the monster has followed them in! Bing and Sula discover that Flop is the monster. So they go back outside, where the billion, zillion stars and a huge moon are waiting for them.

programme.title: Colourblocks

programme.desc: The Squirrels stumble upon a room full of old radio equipment and discover that Duggee used to host his own show! Duggee reminisces about his radio days running Clubhouse Radio, playing music, telling jokes, chatting to callers and reading the news. It was the most popular show on air, until a new rival show appeared and replaced him: the tellingly-named Cheese Radio.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.desc: Foz tries to play an old Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria. Foz suggests they visit Maria, but theres a problem: Xuli was so young when she used to holiday there that she cant remember where it was! Luckily, Fozs keen eyes quickly spot an important clue, and soon theyre searching across Spain in hope of a reunion.

Flop arrives, bringing his sleeping bag and Hoppity so they can all sleep over.

Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside everyones bags are potatoes which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate potatoes inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby!

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Today, Gabriel is making a famous dish from Cornwall that his mum has taught him. Cornish pasties are a traditional lunchtime meal where meat, vegetables or both are wrapped in a pastry case. Gabriel is using the vegetable swede, but his friends dont like the taste of it on its own. Hopefully theyll prefer it when they taste it in the finished pasties. Gabriel shows us a really clever way to crimp the pastry case and serves the pasties to his friends in a traditional way.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures

Rory and Sandy head deep into the forest to try and find some red squirrels, whilst Chantelle heads offshore to an island to meet a local expert who has been studying them in the wild. Chantelle and Rorys fact files help answer all of Alistairs questions.

programme.title: Whats on Your Head?

As Alita learns to navigate her new life and the treacherous streets of Iron City, Ido tries to shield her from her mysterious past.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: In the third series, the search for Britains best amateur baker is back as 12 passionate baking fans compete for the title. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins return as presenters, as do judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood, who devise the three challenges faced by the competitors each week. They incorporate a signature bake, which tests the bakers personality and creative flair; a technical bake, which tests experience; and a showstopper bake, during which the bakers are able to showcase their depth of skill and talent. Berry and Hollywood inspect, prod and sample the baked goodies as they decide who gets to have their cake - and eat it.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Outside influences affect the way the worlds first thinking, feeling robot lives and behaves.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy companys annual gala in a high-rise building. Its now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick OConnell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Primatologist Davis Okoye shares an unshakable bond with George, an extraordinarily intelligent silverback gorilla thats been in his care since birth. When a genetic experiment goes wrong, it causes George, a wolf and a reptile to grow to a monstrous size. As the mutated beasts embark on a path of destruction, Okoye teams up with a discredited genetic engineer and the military to secure an antidote and prevent a global catastrophe.

programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.desc: A sloth named Laura and her family move to the big city with nothing but their prized family recipe book and a rusted old food truck. The familys delicious food soon catches the eye of a quick-witted cheetah named Dotti.

programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a greedy villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the gang back to the age chivalrous knights, spell-casting wizards, and fire-breathing dragons.

programme.desc: Hoping to inspire a new generation of rock stars, Bodi joins a musical competition show and becomes an overnight TV personality sensation.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Jackass 2.5
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the `Jackass crew present more idiotically irresponsible, wilfully dangerous and stomach-turningly gross stunts, taken from footage that was shot for and during the making of `Jackass 2. This time around, the action is interleaved with sections in which the cast and crew talk candidly about their role in the chaos - and how and why some of the scenes didnt turn out entirely as theyd hoped.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: Bessie
programme.desc: The story of legendary blues performer, Bessie Smith, who rose to fame during the 1920s and 30s.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A divorced train commuter passes the house she used to live in with her husband every day. To distract herself she creates a fictional perfect world for her former neighbours in her head. This is ruined when one of the neighbours goes missing.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A glamorous career woman loses control when her married lover, a Manhattan attorney, ends their brief affair. Unable to accept his rejection, she pursues him at the office, and then at his home, eventually drawing his wife and daughter into the confrontation.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoners psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs. Mutants
programme.desc: Gotham City faces catastrophe when Mr Freeze transforms Killer Croc and Bane into mega-sized mutant monsters. As the gigantic villains go on the rampage, its up to the caped crusader to cut them down to size.

programme.title: Straight Outta Nowhere: Scooby-Doo! Meets Courage the Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the Gang find themselves in the middle of Nowhere, Kansas, the backwoods hometown of Courage and his owners, Muriel and Eustace Bagge.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save Sonnys mom and foil Slappys wicked plan.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: grow
programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Goosebumps 2

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Dual
programme.desc: Upon receiving a terminal diagnosis, Sarah opts for a cloning procedure to ease her loss on her friends and family. When she makes a miraculous recovery, her attempts to decommission her clone fail, leading to a court-mandated duel to the death.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In 2041 central Europe, Detective Em investigates the case of a murdered couple where a restoration team brings one of them back to life.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguistics professor leads an elite team of investigators in a race against time to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hanks life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: The Accursed
programme.desc: Elly is asked by a family friend to look after an elderly woman living in a remote cabin. She agrees, but soon discovers there is a demon hiding in the woman just waiting to break free.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hanks life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: A group of would-be criminals kidnaps the 12-year-old daughter of a powerful underworld figure. Holding her for ransom in an isolated mansion, their plan starts to unravel when they discover their young captive is actually a bloodthirsty vampire.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hanks life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: A group of would-be criminals kidnaps the 12-year-old daughter of a powerful underworld figure. Holding her for ransom in an isolated mansion, their plan starts to unravel when they discover their young captive is actually a bloodthirsty vampire.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Hollow Man

The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russias first nuclear submarine and his executive officers first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A university student lives life without fear of consequences.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.desc: When Hope suffers a personal tragedy, her makeshift family rallies around her and steps up to release the few remaining animals.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The team prepare to release two beautiful and elusive spotted cats called servals. The plan goes awry when one escapes into the dangerous city of Lilongwe. Meanwhile, its all hands on deck when a baby monkey arrives in a critical condition.

programme.title: Colombias Wild Coast
programme.desc: A young female black crab is about to undertake the biggest mission of her life - to escort her 80,000 eggs from her mountain top home.

programme.title: Rewilding
programme.desc: The Steinhuder Meer in the heart of northern Germany is a biodiversity hotspot. The richly textured landscape is the ideal outdoor laboratory for biologists who operate Germanys significant reintroduction of wildlife.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michaels Bradshaws-inspired rail tour of London continues in Hampstead, where shortly before the outbreak of the Second World War, a groundbreaking Jewish doctor found refuge. Sigmund Freud fled Vienna by train to escape the Nazis.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his 1930s Bradshaws guide, Michael is in London, where he tracks the River Thames from east to west. Michael is drawn to the industrial eastern suburb by the unexpected sound of pipes.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michaels rail journey through the interwar capital follows Harry Becks map for the London Underground, embraced by Londoners since its launch in 1932. Michael finds out how persistence paid off for Beck after his design was initially rejected.

programme.desc: Three rare Alvises get the auction buyers going when put under the hammer. A Chevy Corvette which started its journey in Saudi Arabia makes its way to Thornton le Dale for the sale.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce takes the team to the Lancashire coast for a busy day in the magnificent Blackpool Tower Ballroom. programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return for a second visit to the Tower Ballroom in Blackpool. programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads off to acquire some vintage motorcycles from a collection in a garage at the bottom of a garden in the North East. Meanwhile, Paul tries to bag a 1955 Ford Zephyr convertible.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: After the Allied landing in Normandy, France falls city after city - but a small island fortress off the coast becomes the stage for a harrowing act of Nazi defiance.

programme.title: Churchills Bid to Abolish Britain
programme.desc: Following an astonishing story which challenges our understanding of the Second World War and our perception of world-renowned leaders.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return with a second helping from a recent visit to Hertford College, Oxford. Objects under the cameras include a bracelet once worn by a princess with a tragic story; expensive ceramics bought for a song at a boot sale; and a rare document recording the end of hostilities in the First World War. Plus, one of the experts shows his hand as an accomplished amateur potter.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head for the beautiful Tamar Valley in Devon, and weigh anchor at Morwellham Quay. Objects fascinating the experts include an ugly brown jug with a handsome valuation, a stunning and rare silver salver, and a long case clock arrives in unexpected fashion.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek navigates the dry stone walls of the Peak District to collect a very original 1988 Opel Manta, Dave handles a rare Ford Granada rally support vehicle, and Paul contends with a Hilux monster truck.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek takes a long drive in a 1960s bus that has had a life in the sun, Dave helps a collector trim his fleet of British classics by taking a Triumph TR7 convertible for auction, and Paul is confused by an agricultural Bonser truck.

programme.title: Equator
programme.desc: In the Galapagos Islands, Simon Reeve meets some of the most beautiful and unique wildlife on the planet. He climbs an active volcano in Ecuador, journeys across war-torn Colombia, meets an Indian tribe that have their own monument to the Equator and ends up in Brazil where he travels through the rainforest.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: A day out on the river leads to epic complications for the Meldrews, Mrs Warboys, and Nick Swainey when they find themselves marooned in the middle of Norfolks answer to the Sargasso Sea.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: The Meldrews are back from holiday and find that Patrick and Pippa are trying to sell up to a man whos very interested in diving goggles. Margaret can take no more of their erratic existence and decides to embark on a reckless adventure that could change both her own and Victors life for ever.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: While on call for jury service, Victor spends a whole day at home alone, but somehow ends up being the one on trial.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek navigates the dry stone walls of the Peak District to collect a very original 1988 Opel Manta, Dave handles a rare Ford Granada rally support vehicle, and Paul contends with a Hilux monster truck.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek, with help from the Mathewson clan, drag a mini pickup out of the barn where its been for 20 years, and a 350cc Douglas Mark V motorbike from 1950 goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Four VW camper vans pitch up at the auction house looking for a new home and Derek picks up an Austin 16 that goes like stink and has some unusual modern modifications.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Exploring Old Joliet Prison, a battered facility near Chicago that descended into open war, but then hosted the Blues Brothers!

programme.title: Equator
programme.desc: In the Galapagos Islands, Simon Reeve meets some of the most beautiful and unique wildlife on the planet. He climbs an active volcano in Ecuador, journeys across war-torn Colombia, meets an Indian tribe that have their own monument to the Equator and ends up in Brazil where he travels through the rainforest.

programme.title: Talvar
programme.desc: A hardened cop deals with three conflicting perspectives involving a brutal double murder. The case is complicated as the prime suspects are the parents who supposedly killed their teenage daughter.

programme.title: Lamhaa
programme.desc: Indian Military Intelligence deputes an agent to Kashmir incognito to find out who is behind extremist attacks.

programme.title: Nikaah
programme.desc: Young and attractive Niloufer is swept off her feet by Wasim Ahmed, a foreign businessman, and the pair marry. However, when Wasim begins dedicating himself more and more to his work, things go wrong.

programme.title: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
programme.desc: A spoiled playboy agrees to marry a woman for one year to please his ailing but wealthy father.

programme.title: Total Siyapaa
programme.desc: A guys plans to impress his Indian girlfriends parents fall apart when they discover that he is Pakistani.

programme.title: Dhoom 2
programme.desc: The Mumbai police force are on alert, as an International thief is suspected to plan a robbery there. To help them capture the thief, they hire a female burglar to befriend and then arrest him.

programme.title: Chak De India
programme.desc: After failing to score the winning goal, Kabir Khan, Captain of the Mens Hockey Team is blamed for the teams loss and fired. Years later he is given a chance to salvage his reputation, when he is offered the position as coach of the Womens Hockey Team.

programme.title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
programme.desc: A wealthy mans son meets a woman at a wedding and sparks fly between them. However, while he wants nothing more than to marry her, she yearns to pursue her dream of becoming an air hostess.

programme.title: Bang Bang!
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a mysterious charmer leads to an adrenaline-fueled, transcontinental adventure for a mild-mannered bank employee.

programme.title: Time Machine
programme.desc: Two friends find a time machine and use it to make money. When their meddling prevents a gangsters death, he wreaks havoc in their lives.

programme.title: Rowdy Sarkar
programme.desc: Anna rules over his people in Rayalaseema and they revere him as God. When an upcoming project threatens the well-being of his people, Anna opposes it. In the bargain, he makes some dangerous enemies.

programme.title: Ishwar Sakshi
programme.desc: A man promises to marry his daughter to a young man in front of a statue of Vishnu as his witness. Later the father refuses and the young man appeals to Vishnu for help.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

programme.title: Salaam Namaste
programme.desc: Following a group of East Indian immigrants as they cope with life and cultural differences in Melbourne, Australia.

programme.title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham ...
programme.desc: When Rahul falls in love with a lower class girl, his father disowns him. Rahul and his wife move to London, and are met years later by Rahuls brother, who is determined to reunite the family.

programme.title: Chhaava
programme.desc: Shivajis death sparks the Maratha-Mughal conflict. His son Sambhaji leads resistance against Aurangzebs forces. Amid battles and intrigue, both sides face challenges in a struggle for power.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: Fate poses a threat to Sailees fairytale hopes by tying her in a lifelong bond with Sachin, an uncouth and emotionally scarred taxi driver who shuns the idea of romance and marriage.

programme.title: Advocate Anjali Awasthi
programme.desc: Struggling lawyer Anjali Awasthi is determined to restore her familys honour and achieve recognition in her field. Driven by her desire to realise her dreams, she takes on a challenging case that could be her big break.

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mothers promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.desc: Middle-class singer Rohit and wealthy Kiran fall in love and intend to marry, but Kirans parents will not allow it. Kiran is adamant, and the marriage takes place but after Kiran gives birth to Sunil, they fall out.
